label.ai_need_screening: The content is generated with the help of AI, so please screen it carefully.
label.chat_no_message_placeholder: Hello, I am {who}. Please send me message.
label.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'?
label.slogan: Lightweight AI assistant based on deep content understanding
label.skill_tool_not_exists: Related tool does not exist, the skill should be deleted

message.doc_exists: Document with the same content already exists
message.doc_in_queue: Document '{name}' is already in the processing queue
message.success_access_to_remote: Access to remote Aiter success, service version: {version}

tip.chat_retrace: The number of history messages to be recalled in each conversation, the greater the value, the more history messages will be recalled and the more tokens will be consumed. Generally, it is recommended to set it to 4 ~ 8.
tip.chat_temperature: The greater the value, the more varied the generated content will be. A value of 0 makes the generated content the most stable, and a value of 0.6 is recommended for general dialog.
tip.digest_deep: Understanding document content at the finest level of granularity, which consumes more tokens. It is generally not necessary to turn this on.
tip.skip_digest: Skip the understanding process, the document content can only be searched, the advantage is that there is no need to wait for the understanding and does not consume tokens. It is generally not necessary to turn this on.
